pr_title: [JENKINS-61711] Fix validateExecutable to allow Git plugin global config correctly report git executable in PATH

timeline.message:
Fix git not in path for Git plugin global config
Git Client Plugin global configuration allows addition of git implementations using GitTool
The field Path was not able to identify git executable. The fix involves changing prefix with
File.seperator instead of File.pathSeperator. This allows Jenkins to find the git exec at the
already existing path.
Tests added to validate JENKINS-61711 fix

timeline.body:
I believe you will receive a more clear assertion failure message if you let Hamcrest compare the objects and assert use `not` to check they are not equal.  When `actual.equals()` is used, it hides information that Hamcrest can use to make the assertion failure message clearer.
```suggestion
        assertThat(actual, not(is(FormValidation.error(failMessage))));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I believe you will receive a more clear assertion failure message if you let Hamcrest compare the objects and assert use not to check they are not equal. When actual.equals() is used, it hides information that Hamcrest can use to make the assertion failure message clearer.

Suggested change
assertThat(actual.equals(FormValidation.error(failMessage)), is(false));
assertThat(actual, not(is(FormValidation.error(failMessage))));
timeline.author: MarkEWaite

timeline.body: Can you confirm that the test requires a JenkinsRule?  If this is not included, does test execution fail or generate null pointer exceptions?
timeline.bodyText: Can you confirm that the test requires a JenkinsRule?  If this is not included, does test execution fail or generate null pointer exceptions?
timeline.bodyHTML: Can you confirm that the test requires a JenkinsRule? If this is not included, does test execution fail or generate null pointer exceptions?
timeline.author: MarkEWaite

replies.bodyText: Yes, the test requires a JenkinsRule because the test checks admin permissions for the Jenkins instance implicitly.
replies.author: rishabhBudhouliya

timeline.message:
Improve hamcrest comparison in FormValidationTest
